alert.note: Alert for Central Cook; Eastern Will; Grundy; Northern Will; Southern Cook; Southern Will (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 15 at 2:13PM CST until February 16 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 9 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations of 1 to 3 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northeast Illinois. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 9 PM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and likely the afternoon commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.

area.areaDesc: Central Cook; Eastern Will; Grundy; Northern Will; Southern Cook; Southern Will
